rule: Each description must not portray the background or outline the setting of the subjects.
output: A muscular male runner mid-stride, wind whipping his hair as he sprints through a sun-drenched park. His focused expression betrays both determination and exertion; sweat beads glisten on his tanned skin.  Golden sunlight streams through the leaves of surrounding oak trees, casting playful patches of light and shadow across the path ahead. The scene exudes energy, capturing the raw power and exhilaration of a runner pushing their limits.
